comments: Tests covering the use of the EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET aggregate function

tests.name: earliest by offset
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ROWKEY BIGINT KEY, ID BIGINT, F0 INT, F1 BIGINT, F2 DOUBLE, F3 BOOLEAN, F4 STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON', key='ID');

CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F0) AS L0, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F1) AS L1, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F2) AS L2, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F3) AS L3, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F4) AS L4 FROM INPUT GROUP BY ID;

tests.name: earliest by offset with nulls
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ROWKEY BIGINT KEY, ID BIGINT, F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON', key='ID');
CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F0) AS L0 FROM INPUT GROUP BY ID;

tests.name: earliest by offset with all nulls
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ROWKEY BIGINT KEY, ID BIGINT, F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON', key='ID');
CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F0) AS L0 FROM INPUT GROUP BY ID;
